==Dialogue==
{{Dialogue Start}}
:'''Justeau:''' Things could go really bad at this rate. Does not one person care?
:{{DIcon}} Care about what?
::'''Justeau:''' Our water pollution problem!
::'''Justeau:''' The crisis is so obvious, like dropping ink into clear water, but everyone just ignores it.
::'''Justeau:''' Do only we of the Salon Caritat care about this in all the land?
:{{DIcon}} See you.
::'''Justeau:''' Believe me, friend, we should all be doing something about this!
{{Dialogue End}}
